pages.text: Adds one XP to any spell cast. This modifier is unique to the (l:amethyst_imbuement:focus/getting_started)Spellcasters Focus$(), to obtain it you must ignite your focus to a new tier and select it from one of three options presented.$(br2)This focus modifier is a good choice for a low-tier focus, as it does not lock you into a particular build, and makes levelling up to higher tiers easier.

pages.mod_text: You feel as if magic is your true calling while holding your focus. Appears on a Spellcasters Focus on tier ignition.
